enchantment.clairvoyance.waypoint.desc: Allows the Casting Stone to place a waypoint that can be teleported back to. Must be on the ground to place a waypoint.
enchantment.clairvoyance.obscure.desc: Hides the player's name tag whilst wearing the Cursed Mask.
enchantment.clairvoyance.cloaked.desc: Changes the user's skin to a pitch-black figure.
enchantment.clairvoyance.impersonate.des: If the Casting Stone is in the player's main hand and they are sneaking the player will turn invisible, re-appearing if the player is no longer sneaking.
enchantment.clairvoyance.materialize.des: Allows the creation and rapid spawning of various items. Fire Charges spawn fireballs and Wind Charges spawn wind charges.
